title.narrative: Energy Efficiency and Self-Supply Renewable Energy Program (PEEERA)

description.narrative: Support local financial intermediaries by delivering effective risk mitigation (e.g. first-loss guarantees) or by allowing mobilization of financing beyond balance sheet constraints, in (i) commercial and industrial sectors; (ii) residential sector; and (iii) third party financed projects, using technologies such as solar PV, biogas, biomass, cogeneration, efficient illumination, motors, compressors, boilers, chillers, thermal insulation and other EE technologies.

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund
